string.text: {=RBM_STR_001}{?IS_RIGHT}Right {TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} is doing hit and run.{?}{\?}{?IS_LEFT}Left {TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} is doing hit and run.{?}{\?}
{=dyY3hkH1}{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are charging at {?IS_PLURAL}different enemy formations{?}an enemy formation{\?}.
{=RBM_STR_004}Cavalry is forming a flying wedge in front of infantry.
{=RBM_STR_009}Form flying wedge in front of infantry
{=RBM_STR_010}Our plan is to attack with full force and flank with archers.
{=RBM_STR_011}Our plan is to split infantry and crush them from all sides.
{=RBM_STR_012}Our plan is to bait them with skirmishers then crush them with full force.
{=RBM_STR_013}Our plan is to form a defensive line with archers on flanks.
{=RBM_STR_014}Our plan is to charge head-on with our cavalry then crush disorganized formations.
